tool_description: Parses and standardizes raw carrier API responses into a unified shipment status format across all carriers.

raw_carrier_response.description: Raw JSON response from carrier API

carrier_name.description: Name of the carrier that provided the response

error_messages: Invalid JSON format: The raw_carrier_response must be valid JSON.
Unsupported carrier format: Unable to parse response format for the specified carrier.
Missing required fields: The carrier response is missing essential tracking information.
Corrupted response data: The carrier response contains invalid or corrupted data.
usage: Provide raw_carrier_response JSON string, carrier_name, and tracking_number. The tool will parse and return standardized shipment information.

current_status.description: Standardized current status (in_transit, out_for_delivery, delivered, exception, etc.)

tracking_events.description: List of tracking events with timestamps

is_exception.description: Whether there's an exception or delay
